text: Nɨ mɨtɨgh bar gavgavigh akongan markɨ. Egh bar deravɨra nan Akar Gavgaviba, dar gɨn mangɨ. Akar Gavgavir kaba, nan ingangarir gumazim Moses, faragha nɨ ganɨngi. Nɨ guizbangɨra bar adar gɨn mangɨva, egh tuavir agharir kɨriamɨn zuiba ko tuavir agharir guvimɨn zuiba dar mangan markɨ. Ia bar Akar Gavgavir kabar tamɨn tuavim ataghɨraghan markɨ. Nɨ kamaghɨn damuva, nɨ danganir manamɨn mangam, nɨ osɨmtɨzir tam batoghan kogh, deravɨra ikiam.
